<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Script to modify the choices for issue type field in issue</description>
        <name>Modify IssueType in issues</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var issues = new GlideRecord('sn_grc_issue');
issues.addNotNullQuery('issue_type');
issues.query();
var issueType;
while (issues.next()) {
    switch (issues.getValue('issue_type')) {
        case 'control_failure':
            issueType = '11';
            break;
        case 'policy_violation':
            issueType = '3';
            break;
        case 'data_breach':
            issueType = '13';
            break;
        case 'process_violation':
            issueType = '6';
            break;
        case 'documentation':
            issueType = '14';
            break;
        case 'fraud':
            issueType = '15';
            break;
        case 'misstatement':
            issueType = '16';
            break;
        case 'training':
            issueType = '17';
            break;
        case 'other':
            issueType = '10';
            break;
    }
    issues.setValue('issue_type', issueType);
	issues.setWorkflow(false);
    issues.update();
}]]></script>
